title: marandadum enna
sahitya:
marandadum enna myamO ariyEn marakata vaNNA mArajanakA ennai


anupallavi

  karuNAnidhi enrun caraNAmbujam tanai niratam paNindu daraNi vAzh enranai


caraNam    janaka sutai tan matimukham kaNDO anujar mUvartam anbil kaTTuNDO
 aDinilai tAngum AnjanEyan tam antaranga bhakti tanil kaLI koNDO
